testcase.name: Check the ability to find results with Flights search gadget
testcase.system-out: Given I am on SuperHomePage.................................................passed When I click on the superHomePageElement 'flightsFormButton'................passed And I fill superHomePage form by 'minimumFlightsProfile' profile............passed And I click on the superHomePageElement 'flyingSearchButton'................passed And I wait for page absolutely load.........................................passed Then I am taken to the FlightsResults page..................................passed

testcase.name: Check logo, main menu, main title and SG buttons
testcase.system-out: Given I am on SuperHomePage.................................................passed Then the superHomePage element 'mainLogo' is visible........................passed And the superHomePage element 'mainMenu' is visible.........................passed And the superHomePage element 'mainTitle' has the text 'Leave London behind Where do you want to go today?'.passed And the superHomePage element 'holidaysFormButton' has the text 'Holidays'..passed And the superHomePage element 'flightsFormButton' has the text 'Flights'....passed And the superHomePage element 'carHireFormButton' has the text 'Car Hire'...passed And the superHomePage element 'hotelsFormButton' has the text 'Hotels'......passed And the superHomePage element 'insuranceFormButton' has the text 'Insurance'.passed
